author: Special Correspondent
text: A private placement camp for unemployed youths of Aranthangi, Avudayarkovil, Mamelkudi and Karambakudi panchayat unions would be held under the auspices of the Tamil Nadu State Rural Livelihood Mission at the TELC Middle School in Aranthangi on February 27, Collector S.Ganesh said in a press release. Candidates in the age group of 18 to 35 can participate in the camp along with their certificates, the release added.
title: Private placement camp
